locale.message: Export or register article metadata in CrossRef format.
Please enter the name and the email of the person responsible for the CrossRef DOI deposit.

If you want to register DOIs with CrossRef, please follow the directions on the CrossRef homepage to receive a username and password. If you do not have your own username and password you'll still be able to export into the CrossRef XML format but you cannot register your DOIs with CrossRef from within OJS. Please note that the password will be saved as plain text, i.e. not encrypted, due to the CrossRef registration service requirements.
Please configure the CrossRef export/registration plug-in before using it for the first time.
Please configure the CrossRef export/registration plug-in:
Please enter the username you got from CrossRef.
All published articles with DOIs have already been registered.

Usage: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} export xmlFileName journal_path {issues|articles} objectId1 [objectId2] ... {$scriptName} {$pluginName} register journal_path {issues|articles} objectId1 [objectId2] ...
